announcements.title: APIs @ ACC + AWICS
announcements.description: We also have a second event going on this week. Our workshops chairs are partnering with AWiCS to bring you a special workshop over APIs this Tuesday from 7pm to 8pm in HRBB 113. Food will be provided!

announcements.title: Board Game Night
announcements.description: Bring your favorite game if you would like to share with others, but games and snacks will be provided too!

announcements.title: Data Science & Free Food with General Motors
announcements.description: One of our former presidents, Rohit Mucherla, will be visiting the club with his employer, General Motors. They have planned an interactive data science activity for you and will also be bringing dinner. We will also have a short hands-on API activity at 8:30pm.

announcements.title: Internship Advice from Dr. Tyagi
announcements.description: Dr. Aakash Tyagi will be giving a talk titled 'Internship...Ready...Get Set GO'. He has worked in industry for years, and is uniquely equipped to discuss his experiences working with students. Later, our workshops chairs will be giving a workshop on Consuming and Understanding APIs.

announcements.title: Accessibility in Coding
announcements.description: Justin Romack, Assistive Tech Coordinator with Disability Resources, will share his perspective as a totally blind professional working in the accessible technologies field. Later, we'll have a brief workshop on Developing an Accessible Website.

announcements.title: Project Presentations
announcements.description: Hear from the project managers who will be hosting projects that you have the opportunity to join! You will get the chance to hear from each project manager, and then stay after and ask questions to get to know them. There will be NO workshop.

announcements.title: Informational Meeting
announcements.description: Get to know about all the awesome things we will be doing this semester, including a Show and Tell with huge prizes, our second annual Smash competition, and much more! Later, learn from a workshop about project management.

announcements.title: Capital One Food and Fireside Chat
announcements.description: Michael McKenna is our former President. Meeting is intended for you to get to know Michael, eat yummy food, and learn about Capital One.
